response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which we believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. We understand its potential worth to you stands at $800,000, but based on our thorough market analysis and the unique features of this product, we are offering it to you at an exceptional price of $950,000. This is an opportunity not only to secure a valuable asset but also to potentially increase your return on investment. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
